events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is very disappointing.
The customer complaint regarding a refund request was categorized under the Refund cluster due to keywords detected.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund case for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello, I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to assist you with your refund request for the incorrect item you received.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process your refund promptly?
Thank you for your quick response. My order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the incorrect item delivered.
We have reviewed the photo and order details. We will issue a full refund within 3-5 business days and provide a prepaid return label.
I appreciate your swift assistance and the refund solution sounds perfect. Thank you for resolving this quickly.
The refund process has been initiated and the return shipment arranged. Thank you for your cooperation, the issue is now resolved.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and that everything is now satisfactory regarding your recent order issue.
Since the refund was received and no further requests were made, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
